metadata.title: CVE-2020-6506 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in WebView in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 83.0.4103.106 allowed a remote attacker to bypass site isolationvia a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
